title: How to prepare myself for BSc 1st year PCM - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are good at learning from google or YouTube or any other online website, then that is good, go learn and do practical like solve mathematics problems and physics numericals and chemistry also. Practice makes it easy for you to learn or remind those things. Or If you are not good at learning from internet then please don't waste ur time, go and take tuitions of each and every subject. The tutor will will teach each and every subject thoroughly.
